text:
Roger Grenier (19 September 1919 – 8 November 2017) was a French writer, and journalist. He was Regent of the Collège de ’Pataphysique. He was born in Caen, France. He was known for his work "The Difficulty of Being a Dog". He worked for "Combat" then at "France Soir".
Grenier died of complications from pneumonia in Paris on 8 November 2017 at the age of 98.

annotations.surface_form: The Difficulty of Being a Dog
